author: palladia
body: New-Object is an often-used cmdlet.  Currently there's only one Pester test.

comments.body: I think more time has been spent moving this issuearound than it would have taken to do it at this point. Since there's a newer (and more detailed) issue open, I'll close it.

title: New-Object cmdlet needs better Pester coverage
